item.title: 임창정,Julio Iglesias - TO ALL THE GIRLS I'VE LOVED BEFORE

작곡: A.HAMMOND / 작사: H.DAVID
KY: 5700

이보다는 못할거야

나의 모든걸
모두
널 위한거란 걸

I’ve once for last
and may I say I’ve
tell the best
for helping
meet to fool
how young
a lot I knew
To all the girls
I’ve loved before
the wish of change
always blowing
and every time
I’ve try to stay
the wish of change
until you blowing
and they just carrying
you all way

난 오직
너를 위해 살아갈게
널 위한거라면
그 어떤 것보다
소중히 기억할거야

who get for me
who feel my night
with ecstasy
they live with
in my heart
they
always be apart
To all the girls
I’ve loved before
the wish of change
always blowing
and every time
I’ve try to stay
the wish of change

To all the girls
with love before

where they
a lot to came along

To all the girls
With loved before

who trouble pain in
